1607.author: undefined
1607.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

2068.message: Run Button now moving when window is resized

2074.author: lauritz
2074.message: fixed a bug (onBlur event handling) and added the world to the target chooser

2078.author: lauritz
2078.message: Refactoring of script annotations (now at scripts not morphs). Added category tagging. Layout changes.

2082.author: lauritz
2082.message: two more checks on attempts to remove scripts or connections.

2084.author: lauritz
2084.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

2086.author: lauritz
2086.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

2088.author: lauritz
2088.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

2096.author: lauritz

2098.author: lauritz

2102.author: lauritz

2104.author: lauritz

2106.author: lauritz
2106.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

2110.author: lauritz
2110.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.
